item.title: hugo更换404公益页面
item.description: layouts文件夹，新建404.html <!DOCTYPE HTML> <html> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8" /> <meta name="description" content="公益404页面是由腾讯公司员工志愿者自主发起的互联网公益活动。" /> <link rel="icon" href="data:image/gif;base64,"> <title>404 您访问的页面搞丢了</title> </head> <body> <script> let s = document.createElement("script"); s.src="//volunteer.cdn-go.cn/404/latest/404.js" s.crossorigin="anonymous" document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(s); </script> </body> </html> <!-- */ //-->
item.content:encoded:
layouts文件夹，新建404.html

<!DOCTYPE HTML>
<html>
<head>
<meta charset="UTF-8" />
<meta name="description" content="公益404页面是由腾讯公司员工志愿者自主发起的互联网公益活动。" />
<link rel="icon" href="data:image/gif;base64,">
<title>404 您访问的页面搞丢了</title>
</head>
<body>
<script>
let s = document.createElement("script");
s.src="//volunteer.cdn-go.cn/404/latest/404.js"
s.crossorigin="anonymous"
document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(s);
</script>
</body>
</html>
<!-- */ //-->
